ActInvest in Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of MITCHELL GARBER, C.M., of Montr√©al, Quebec, as Chairperson of the board of directors of the Invest in Canada Hub, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term ending on December 31, 2022, or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective March 12, 2022.
